name: sketch-n-script
description: The Google docs add-on to enter formulas in your doc

scripts.compile: tsc --noImplicitUseStrict -p src/ --outDir add-on/ && sed -i '12,15d' add-on/Update.js && sed -i '1s/var __assign/syntax = typeof syntax == "undefined" ? this : syntax;\nvar __assign/' add-on/Update.js
